meta.structure: Group Stage -> Round of 32 -> Round of 16 -> QF -> SF -> Final

betting_categories.description: Long-term wagers determined by final tournament standings or cumulative awards.

bets.name: World Cup Winner
bets.description: A wager on which nation will win the final match on July 19, 2026.

bets.name: Golden Boot Winner
bets.description: A bet on the individual player who scores the most goals during the tournament.

bets.name: Golden Ball Winner
bets.description: A wager on the player voted the best overall performer of the tournament.

bets.name: Golden Glove Winner
bets.description: A wager on the goalkeeper voted the best in the tournament (most clean sheets/saves).

bets.name: FIFA Young Player Award
bets.description: A bet on the best player under 21 years of age.

bets.name: To Reach the Final/Semi/Quarter
bets.description: A bet that a specific team will advance to a designated round, regardless of the outcome in that round.

bets.name: Winning Confederation
bets.description: A wager on the continent (e.g., UEFA, CONMEBOL) of the winning team.

bets.name: Team Top Goalscorer
bets.description: A bet on which player will score the most goals specifically for their own country.

bets.name: Stage of Elimination
bets.description: A prediction of the exact round in which a team will be knocked out (e.g., USA to lose in Round of 16).

betting_categories.description: Futures specifically related to the results of the 12 groups (A-L).

bets.name: Group Winner
bets.description: A wager on which team will finish 1st in their specific group standings.

bets.name: To Qualify (To Advance)
bets.description: A bet on a team to finish in the Top 2 or as a 'Best 3rd Place' team to reach the Round of 32.

bets.name: Group Exact Finish
bets.description: Predicting the exact 1-2-3-4 order of teams in a group.

bets.name: To Finish Bottom
bets.description: A wager on which team will finish in last place (4th) in their group.

betting_categories.description: Standard wagers placed before kickoff on the outcome of a single match.

bets.name: 3-Way Moneyline
bets.description: A wager on the result after 90 mins + injury time: Team A Win, Team B Win, or Draw.

bets.name: Draw No Bet
bets.description: A bet on a team to win that refunds the stake if the match ends in a tie.

bets.name: Double Chance
bets.description: A wager covering two outcomes (e.g., Team A Win OR Draw) to reduce risk.

bets.name: Spread / Handicap
bets.description: A bet where a team must win by more than a set goal margin (e.g., -1.5) to cover.

bets.name: Total Goals (Over/Under)
bets.description: A wager on whether the combined score will be higher or lower than a set number (e.g., 2.5).

bets.name: Both Teams to Score (BTTS)
bets.description: A Yes/No wager on whether both teams will score at least one goal.

bets.name: Correct Score
bets.description: A high-risk wager predicting the exact final scoreline (e.g., 2-1).

bets.name: Halftime/Fulltime (HT/FT)
bets.description: Predicting the result at halftime AND the result at fulltime in one bet.

betting_categories.description: Wagers on specific events or stats within a match.

bets.name: Anytime Goalscorer
bets.description: A bet on a specific player to score a goal at any moment during regulation.

bets.name: Player Assists
bets.description: A wager on a specific player to provide the final pass leading to a goal.

bets.name: Total Corners
bets.description: Over/Under wager on the total number of corner kicks taken by both teams.

bets.name: Total Cards (Bookings)
bets.description: Over/Under wager on the total number of yellow/red cards issued.

bets.name: Player Shots on Target
bets.description: A bet on whether a player will have more/fewer shots on goal than a set line.

bets.name: Clean Sheet
bets.description: A bet on a team to prevent the opponent from scoring any goals.

betting_categories.description: Dynamic wagers placed after the match has started.

bets.name: Next Goal
bets.description: A wager on which team will score the very next goal of the match.

bets.name: Rest of Match Winner
bets.description: Who will win the remainder of the game from the current moment (ignoring current score).

bets.name: Interval Betting (15-min)
bets.description: Will a goal occur within a specific time block (e.g., 60:00â€“74:59)?
